      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<int[]> equityEmployeeGroups()
      get the groups of equitable employees

      get the list of forbidden patterns a pattern is defined by a string of activity literals prefixed by a number = 9 for a sliding pattern or = the first day index (0=MONDAY, ..., 6=SUNDAY) for a weekly pattern
